Lottery.title: Mega Millions jackpot rises to $825M
Lottery.description:
The Mega Millions jackpot continues to heat up, soaring to $825 million for Friday's drawing. 

If won on that level, it would be the largest December prize and the seventh largest jackpot in Mega Millions history. 

The jackpot has been growing since Sept. 10, when it was last won at $810 million in Texas. No ticket matched the recent drawing's winning numbers, though Tuesday's drawing produced several million-dollar winners. 

READ MORE: https://www.wcnc.com/article/news/nation-world/mega-millions-winning-numbers-tuesday-december-17-2024/507-fb82ea38-1098-4ccd-a0e7-8222e4fb7f4e
Lottery.transcript: Mega Mills lottery is heating up. Nobody claimed last night's prize, and that means the jackpot for this Friday's drawing is up to $825 million. That is the 7th largest prize ever. Now the chances of winning are very low, sitting at 1 in $302 million.

Lottery.title: Mega Millions draws rare consecutive numbers but no winner
Lottery.description:
No one hit the jackpot in Tuesday‚Äôs Mega Millions drawing, which saw a rare consecutive sequence of numbers with 56, 66, 67, 68, 69 and 18 for the Mega Ball. Friday‚Äôs jackpot is now $825 million, the 7th largest Mega Millions prize of all time.

Lottery.title: MegaMillions: December 17, 2024
Lottery.description: Here are the winning MegaMillions numbers for December 17, 2024.
Lottery.transcript: Jackpots, it's Mega Mills. What's up, America? I'm John Crow. It's Tuesday, December 17th, and tonight's Mega Millions jackpot is an estimated annuitize $760 million to win that jackpot. You must be these 5 white balls plus that gold mega ball. Now let's see if I can make you a millionaire tonight. Our first winning number tonight is 68. That's followed by. 67. Up next we have 56. Your next number is 69 and your final white ball number for this Tuesday evening at 66. Now for the mega ball number that is 18. Again tonight's winning numbers are 68, 67, 56, 69, 66, and the gold mega ball is 18. Now no matches all 6 numbers Friday's jackpot could be more than $825 million. Play on America.

comments.author: @lakeatman504
comments.text: Something similar happened to me before. I bought a quick-pick ticket with the numbers 17, 18, 19, and 20. I can't recall the Mega Ball number or if it was even a Powerball or Mega Millions ticket. I found the combination odd, so I ended up purchasing another quick-pick ticket. When I got home, I looked up past drawings to see if there had been any similar sequences.
